reviewText: Great videos we use for marriage prep with our church.
Awesome Theology of the Body based marriage prep program!
We got so much out of using Father's set, we bought our own set so we could review it whenever we wanted throughout our marriage. My spouse and I are both in our 70's.

Our church has just started using this marriage prep course in place of a mildly catholic one we had been trained for.  So far we have had two couples that we have gone thought this with in 4months.  (we meet in our home with the couples several times.)  I have to say we are on fire with these teachings!  Full of deep catholic knowledge, it gives the couple lots to consider and think about.  They are getting married in the catholic church so give them the catholic view on marriage with this very inspirational series! You won't see instant conversions but we pray the Holy Spirit has planted the seeds to inspire them to pray and allow God in their marriage.  My only criticism is that it is soooo full of deep Catholicism that it's hard at times to know where to begin without the DVDs and if you use the DVDs...we find the couples are not as open in discussion. I think they get overwhelmed too!  In the end, you leave knowing you gave them full and sound catholic teaching on marriage.

Some topics covered:
Lust/addiction
Redeeming love
Sacrifice
NFP/contraception
Vows
The whole submission thing
And lots more!

This is an excellent presentation on Theology of the Body as it pertains to Sacramental Marriage and Sexuality. Christopher West presents a clear and direct view of the Catholic teaching on this subject while maintaining a tone of invitation rather than preaching.  We will be using this program for our Marital Workshops and look forward to sharing this beautiful view of married love.
